basics.name: Anthony Forest
basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: Frontend Developer with 5 years of experience increasing responsiveness and decreasing load times of mission critical frontend web applications.

highlights: Lead the development for the aggregation of exercise science data derived from artificial intelligence and machine learning.
Created a data-collection API designed to interact with Inertia Measurement Units (IMU's) to collect over 10,000 datapoints per minute.
Designed the UI/UX of end-user mobile application allowing users to view 100 machine learning predicted statistics.
Automated collation of over 10 million data endpoints from multiple sources.
Lead the development of over 15 eCommerce projects using HTML/CSS, Javascript and Nuxt.JS resulting in over 80% increase in online sales.
Spearheaded development of impactful websites reaching a combined 50,000 end-users.
decreased load times by 80% and increased responsiveness by 90% migrating existing projects to modern web frameworks.
Rendered over 1,000 products and blog post dynamically using Headless CMS API's and server-side languages.

work.summary: led a small team in the designing, development, enhancement, testing and deployment of web applications for small businesses
highlights: Maintained and analyzed website performance for +100 clients using Google Analytics.
Assisted with the development of assessment strategies designed to evaluate the office's website.
Implemented test driven development into the companies workflow decreasing average project completetion time by 40%
Worked directly with developers to cross browser test over 100 websites using Selenium.
Worked asychronously with marketing on the CRO process increasing conversion rates by 10% with targeted SEO keywords.
Windows Server administration and maintenance including Active Directory and Group Policy.
Installed, configured and patched Linux, Windows 2008 and Windows 2012 Servers.
Trained personnel on network administration, EKMS and helpdesk procedures.
Provided helpdesk support to 20+ local business clients in partnership.
Documented issues and generated reports of common issues while issuing and filing tickets.
Assists appointments for in-house IT maintenance, services and installations.
Engaged in complex projects with administration increasing monthly revenue 20%.

work.summary: Started off as a front end developer but took on the role of CTO in early 2013. The application frontend is built with Javascript and organized as a single page application that talks to a collection of Rails web servers which are connected to MongoDB.
highlights: Led the resolution of technical issues, working with leadership to ensure customer satisfaction.
Resolved over 25 troubleshooting tickets per day, focusing on high impact issues.
Managed a high workload in a fast-paced environment, working on up to 5 devices at a time.
Marked consistently as the top producer, logging most computers repaired per hour.
